languages.text: The worship of the Machine God, while it conflicts with the theology of the Imperial Cult, is allowed to continue and even spread without hindrance since the Adeptus Mechanicus is vital to the survival of the Imperium. The Omnissiah is the Machine God made manifest, and the Priesthood of Mars believes the God-Emperor to be this manifestation.
languages.original_text: Эта вера противоречит теологии Имперского культа, где в роли единого бога людей выступает Император Человечества. Однако, так как Адептус Механикус жизненно необходим Империуму для выживания, это противоречие часто обходится тем, что Бога-Машину признают воплощением Императора.

traits.locale_text: This belief conflicts with the theology of the Imperial Cult where the only god of Humanity is the Emperor of Mankind. Yet since the Adeptus Mechanicus is vital to the survival of the Imperium, conflict over this issue is often avoided by the accepted notion that the Machine God is an avatar of the Emperor Himself.

This belief conflicts with the theology of the Imperial Cult where the only god of Humanity is the Emperor of Mankind. Yet since the Adeptus Mechanicus is vital to the survival of the Imperium, conflict over this issue is often avoided by the accepted notion that the Machine God is an avatar of the Emperor Himself.

The worship of the Machine God, while it conflicts with the theology of the Imperial Cult, is allowed to continue and even spread without hindrance since the Adeptus Mechanicus is vital to the survival of the Imperium. The Omnissiah is the Machine God made manifest, and the Priesthood of Mars believes the God-Emperor to be this manifestation.

languages.text: Эта вера противоречит теологии Имперского культа, где в роли единого бога людей выступает Император Человечества. Однако, так как Адептус Механикус жизненно необходим Империуму для выживания, это противоречие часто обходится тем, что Бога-Машину признают воплощением Императора.

Die Anbetung des Maschinengottes steht zwar im Widerspruch zur Theologie des Imperialen Kultes, darf aber ungehindert fortgesetzt werden und sich sogar ausbreiten, da der Adeptus Mechanicus für das Überleben des Imperiums unerlässlich ist. Der Omnissiah ist der manifestierte Maschinengott, und die Priesterschaft des Mars glaubt, dass der Gottimperator diese Manifestation ist.
languages.original_text: The worship of the Machine God, while it conflicts with the theology of the Imperial Cult, is allowed to continue and even spread without hindrance since the Adeptus Mechanicus is vital to the survival of the Imperium. The Omnissiah is the Machine God made manifest, and the Priesthood of Mars believes the God-Emperor to be this manifestation.

traits.locale_text: Die Anbetung des Maschinengottes steht zwar im Widerspruch zur Theologie des Imperialen Kultes, darf aber ungehindert fortgesetzt werden und sich sogar ausbreiten, da der Adeptus Mechanicus für das Überleben des Imperiums unerlässlich ist. Der Omnissiah ist der manifestierte Maschinengott, und die Priesterschaft des Mars glaubt, dass der Gottimperator diese Manifestation ist.

languages.text: Le culte du Dieu-Machine, même s'il entre en conflit avec la théologie du Culte Impérial, est autorisé à perdurer et même à se répandre sans obstacle, car l'Adeptus Mechanicus est essentiel à la survie de l'Imperium. L'Omnimessie est la manifestation du Dieu-Machine, et le clergé de Mars croit que le Empereur-Dieu en est l'incarnation.
languages.original_text: The worship of the Machine God, while it conflicts with the theology of the Imperial Cult, is allowed to continue and even spread without hindrance since the Adeptus Mechanicus is vital to the survival of the Imperium. The Omnissiah is the Machine God made manifest, and the Priesthood of Mars believes the God-Emperor to be this manifestation.

traits.locale_text: Le culte du Dieu-Machine, bien qu'en conflit avec la théologie du Culte Impérial, est autorisé à se poursuivre et même à se répandre car l'Adeptus Mechanicus est vital pour la survie de l'Imperium. L'Omnimessie est la manifestation du Dieu-Machine, et le Clergé de Mars croient que le Dieu-Empereur est cette manifestation.

languages.text: 机械修会崇拜万机之神。尽管这与帝国国教的神学理念相冲突，但国教允许机械修会的信条存在，甚至允许他们的信条不受阻碍地传播，因为机械修会对帝国的存续至关重要。机械修会相信，欧姆尼塞亚是万机之神的显现，而神皇本身也是另一种显现形式。
languages.original_text: The worship of the Machine God, while it conflicts with the theology of the Imperial Cult, is allowed to continue and even spread without hindrance since the Adeptus Mechanicus is vital to the survival of the Imperium. The Omnissiah is the Machine God made manifest, and the Priesthood of Mars believes the God-Emperor to be this manifestation.

traits.locale_text: 机械修会崇拜万机之神。尽管这与帝国国教的神学理念相冲突，但国教允许机械修会的信条存在，甚至允许他们的信条不受阻碍地传播，因为机械修会对帝国的存续至关重要。机械修会相信，欧姆尼塞亚是万机之神的显现，而神皇本身也是另一种显现形式。

languages.text: 機械神（マシンゴッド）の崇拝は帝国聖教会の神学と相反するものだが、帝国技術局は帝国の存続に不可欠な存在であるため、妨げられることなく継続すること、さらには拡散することが許されている。万機神（オムニシア）は機械神が顕現したものであり、火星の神官団は神帝陛下をこの顕現であると信じている。
languages.original_text: The worship of the Machine God, while it conflicts with the theology of the Imperial Cult, is allowed to continue and even spread without hindrance since the Adeptus Mechanicus is vital to the survival of the Imperium. The Omnissiah is the Machine God made manifest, and the Priesthood of Mars believes the God-Emperor to be this manifestation.

traits.locale_text: 機械神（マシンゴッド）の崇拝は帝国聖教会の神学と相反するものだが、帝国技術局は帝国の存続に不可欠な存在であるため、妨げられることなく継続すること、さらには拡散することが許されている。万機神（オムニシア）は機械神が顕現したものであり、火星の神官団は神帝陛下をこの顕現であると信じている。

languages.text: El culto al Dios Máquina, si bien entra en conflicto con la teología del Culto Imperial, puede practicarse libremente e incluso se divulga sin inconvenientes, ya que el Adeptus Mechanicus es de gran importancia para la supervivencia del Imperium. Dado que el Omnissiah es la manifestación del Dios Máquina, el Sacerdocio de Marte cree que el Dios Emperador cumple dicha función.
languages.original_text: The worship of the Machine God, while it conflicts with the theology of the Imperial Cult, is allowed to continue and even spread without hindrance since the Adeptus Mechanicus is vital to the survival of the Imperium. The Omnissiah is the Machine God made manifest, and the Priesthood of Mars believes the God-Emperor to be this manifestation.

traits.locale_text: El culto al Dios Máquina, si bien entra en conflicto con la teología del Culto Imperial, puede practicarse libremente e incluso se divulga sin inconvenientes, ya que el Adeptus Mechanicus es de gran importancia para la supervivencia del Imperium. Dado que el Omnissiah es la manifestación del Dios Máquina, el Sacerdocio de Marte cree que el Dios Emperador cumple dicha función.

languages.text: Makine Tanrı'ya tapınma her ne kadar İmparatorluk Tarikatı teolojisiyle çelişse de Adeptus Mechanicus, İmparatorluk'un bekası için hayati önem arz ettiği için varlıklarını sürdürmelerine ve hatta yayılmalarına izin verilir. Hermesih, Makine Tanrı'nın tezahürüdür ve Mars Rahipliği de Tanrı İmparator'un bu tezahür olduğuna inanır.
languages.original_text: The worship of the Machine God, while it conflicts with the theology of the Imperial Cult, is allowed to continue and even spread without hindrance since the Adeptus Mechanicus is vital to the survival of the Imperium. The Omnissiah is the Machine God made manifest, and the Priesthood of Mars believes the God-Emperor to be this manifestation.
